attributes.action: Stop changes to PIP and unfair scapegoating of disabled people
attributes.additional_details: Disabled people are being unfairly stigmatised. Many have worked hard and paid into the system all of their lives and yet in their time of need they are now being let down.
attributes.background: Cancel plans to change the PIP process. People need to be treated as humans /individuals not a tick box exercise to save money.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Protect Disabled people who cannot work from planned cuts to benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721547

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918
